# Authorization to Perform Security Testing

**Date:** [DATE]

---

## Authorization

I, [AUTHORIZING PERSON NAME], [TITLE] of [COMPANY NAME] ("Company"), hereby authorize [YOUR NAME / COMPANY] ("Tester") to perform security testing on the systems and applications listed below.

---

## Authorized Scope

### Systems Authorized for Testing

| System | URL/IP Address | Description |
|--------|---------------|-------------|
| [System 1] | [URL] | [Description] |
| [System 2] | [URL] | [Description] |
| [System 3] | [URL] | [Description] |

### Testing Period

- **Start Date:** [DATE]
- **End Date:** [DATE]
- **Testing Hours:** [e.g., 24/7 or business hours only]

### Testing Types Authorized

- [x] Automated vulnerability scanning
- [x] Manual penetration testing
- [x] Web application testing
- [x] API security testing
- [x] Authentication testing
- [x] Authorization testing
- [ ] Social engineering (if applicable)
- [ ] Physical testing (if applicable)

---

## Conditions

### Rate Limiting
- Maximum [X] requests per second
- Tester will pause if performance issues observed

### Notification
- Tester will notify [CONTACT] before starting each testing session
- Tester will notify immediately upon discovering critical vulnerabilities

### Data Handling
- Tester will not exfiltrate, modify, or delete production data
- Any test data created will be removed after testing
- All findings will be kept confidential

### Emergency Contact
- If issues arise, Tester will contact: [NAME] at [PHONE/EMAIL]
- Company can halt testing at any time by contacting: [TESTER CONTACT]

---

## Exclusions

The following are NOT authorized:
- Denial of Service attacks
- Testing outside the specified systems
- Social engineering of employees (unless specified)
- Physical access attempts (unless specified)
- Testing during [blackout periods, if any]

---

## Indemnification

Company agrees to indemnify and hold harmless Tester from any claims arising from authorized testing activities performed within the scope defined in this authorization.

---

## Confirmation of Authority

I confirm that:
1. I have the authority to authorize this testing on behalf of [COMPANY NAME]
2. All systems listed are owned by or authorized for testing by [COMPANY NAME]
3. No third-party systems are included without proper authorization
4. I understand the nature of security testing and its potential impacts
